name: Cockroach Bang
description:
Become the real lord of the kitchen trying to defeat all these horrifying monsters… the cockroach army itself! They are here to eat your birthday cake and hurt you as much as possible, but you’re brave and brutal – don’t let them do this awful thing! Play our amazing Cockroach Bang game and gain the real dominance over these disgusting monsters – reconquer your kitchen!

Cockroach Bang features:
• Real cockroach smash fighting arcade
• Insane number of disgusting cockroaches
• Helpful boosters – including freeze, disorientation, and neutralization
• Opportunity to improve your tapping skills
• Amazing rewards and warlike atmosphere
• Chance to save your birthday cake
• Super repellent effects on these insects

Don’t let them ruin your holiday – do everything possible to get rid of this cockroach plague! Tap all these nasty creatures of Cockroach Bang game and win your cake back!
